content: tula s mitts is also available online at crochet uncut 1 i have had complaints that the pdf function for that page loses the formatting so i m also providing a formatted pdf for download these mitts were inspired by the character tula cowan from maria v snyder s fire study also referenced in storm glass and sea glass she was a young woman who crafted beautiful glass animals these mitts are warm and basic with a twist - a corded back lace edging lends them a delicate air 1 http //www crochetuncut com/index php option=com_content&view=article&id=171
